name: Scuffson
description:
This Is A Fan Remake of Karlson, a game by Dani https://www.youtube.com/c/DaniDev

Enjoy

check out my YouTube where I upload devlogshttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1KAh0Gm6YUNTXCW07PANSA

Note it is easy to clip out of bounds and there are no death plain so press R to reset the level. There also are not that many levels.
